1:
provider = "google"
auth_logging = true
cookie_domains = ".${FAMILY_DOMAIN}"
cookie_httponly = true
cookie_name = "_john_family_oauth"
cookie_refresh = "1h"
cookie_samesite = "lax"
cookie_secure = true
email_domains = [ "${FAMILY_DOMAIN}" ]
pass_access_token = true
pass_authorization_header = true
pass_basic_auth = false
request_logging = true
session_store_type = "cookie"
silence_ping_logging = true
set_authorization_header = true
set_xauthrequest = true
skip_jwt_bearer_tokens = true
skip_provider_button = true
ssl_insecure_skip_verify = false
standard_logging = true
upstreams = [ "static://200" ]
whitelist_domains = ".${FAMILY_DOMAIN}"
footer = "For Internal Family Use Only"
reverse_proxy = "true"
redirect_url = "https://sso.${FAMILY_DOMAIN}/oauth2/callback"

echo port=$DNSMASQ__PORT > /etc/dnsmasq/dnsmasq.conf && \
echo address=$DNSMASQ__ADDRESS >> /etc/dnsmasq/dnsmasq.conf && \
echo user=$DNSMASQ__USER >> /etc/dnsmasq/dnsmasq.conf && \
echo group=$DNSMASQ__GROUP >> /etc/dnsmasq/dnsmasq.conf && \
echo "log-queries" >> /etc/dnsmasq/dnsmasq.conf && \
cat /etc/dnsmasq/dnsmasq.conf

0:
upstream:
  externalResolvers:
  - tcp+udp:1.1.1.1
  - tcp+udp:8.8.8.8
  - tcp+udp:8.8.4.4
conditional:
  mapping:
    ${SECRET_DOMAIN}: tcp+udp:192.168.1.201
blocking:
  blackLists:
    ads:
    - https://raw.githubusercontent.com/StevenBlack/hosts/master/hosts
    - https://s3.amazonaws.com/lists.disconnect.me/simple_ad.txt
    - http://sysctl.org/cameleon/hosts
    - https://s3.amazonaws.com/lists.disconnect.me/simple_tracking.txt
  whiteLists:
    ads:
      - https://raw.githubusercontent.com/anudeepND/whitelist/master/domains/whitelist.txt
  clientGroupsBlock:
    default:
      - ads
clientLookup:
  upstream: tcp+udp:192.168.1.201
prometheus:
  enable: true
  path: /metrics
httpPort: 4000
logFormat: json
logLevel: info
